meanings.definition: The act of being devoted or dedicated to a cause or person.
meanings.sent1: Her devotement to her family was unwavering.
meanings.sent2: The soldier's devotement to his country was evident in his every action.
meanings.sent3: His devotement to his favorite sports team sometimes led to friendly arguments with his friends.
meanings.sent4: Her devotement to her craft was like a bright guiding light in the darkness of uncertainty.
meanings.sent5: The devotement she showed to her studies was truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: The state of being deeply committed or loyal.
meanings.sent1: The dog showed devotement to its owner by never leaving their side.
meanings.sent2: His devotement to his best friend was evident in the way he always had their back.
meanings.sent3: The cat's devotement to its favorite toy was both amusing and endearing.
meanings.sent4: Her devotement to her principles was like an unbreakable fortress in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent5: The devotement of the volunteers to their cause was truly commendable.

meanings.definition: The quality of showing strong affection or admiration.
meanings.sent1: The child's devotement to their favorite toy was heartwarming.
meanings.sent2: His devotement to his mentor was clear in the way he listened to every word.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's devotement to its owner sometimes led to comical antics.
meanings.sent4: Her devotement to her art was like a blossoming flower in the spring.
meanings.sent5: The devotement she felt for her grandmother was evident in every visit.
